page.title: 02Leisure
page.content: I like watching a lot of television up in my bedroom. I like watching adventure films best. I have got two computers and like computer games. My best are Pac Man and Trans Am. I enjoy going to the cinema in Barnsley. I collect football books and stickers. Every Sunday my dad washes his car. After he has done that he goes to a gun club for a shoot. He has 2 twelve bore shotguns and an air gun. My mum likes to knit in front of the television when she has the time. Every Saturday at 9 o'clock my sister goes horse riding. She has been doing this for 5 years and is quite horse mad.
